projects.title: Grand Final Gulliver
projects.description:
Final event of the Gulliver search for Leidens best Student Entrepreneur. 

At the Aalmarktzaal in Leiden five finalists competed for the title Gulliver of Leiden 2016. Bob Heeren was the Moderator who made sure everything went as we planned and he interviewed prince Constantijn van Oranje Nassau. We had Johan van Maanen and Giel Hendriks as guest speakers. 

NADES Solutions from Niall Hodgins was the winner and went home with 10000 euro seed funding.
There was also a price for the crowd favourite which was Zero. With their square they keep your drinks cool on a hot summer day.

projects.title: Hackathon Ministerie Binnenlandse zaken en Koninkrijksrelateis
projects.description:
De app die we hebben gemaakt pakte identiteitsfraude preventief aan door niet alleen de gebruiker zich te laten identificeren maar ook het aanvragende bedrijf. Een systeem vergelijkbaar met ideal betalingen. Het systeem hebben we Dual Trust genoemd omdat het vertrouwen geeft bij de burger over waar zijn informatie heen gaat, en vertrouwen geeft bij het bedrijf/instantie dat ze accurate data krijgen.

De vragen die de burger te zien krijgt om zich te identificeren kunnen uit de volgene set van identificatiemethoden komen:
- gezichtsherkenning
- stemherkenning
- handtekening herkenning
- vraag naar adres
- vraag naar bsn
- vraag naar bsn van ouder/ of andere naaste familie
- vraag naar geboorteplaats
- 3D gezichtsherkenning.
- ...
En vele meer.

Afhankelijk van hoe gevoelig de informatie is die het bedrijf/instantie wil opvragen wordt er een zwaardere identificatie methode gebruikt. Verder hebben alle verschillende methoden een punten aantal, en afhankelijk van hoe de identificatie verloopt worden er punten toegekend (dit omdat gezichtsherkenning nooit 100% kan slagen).

projects.title: Stemt.nu
projects.description: Application developed for the municipality elections in the Netherlands for 2014. The app contains a list of questions, that can help the user select which party to vote for. An inquiry module is created to also use the app after the elections to check the public opinion on matters concerning the municipality.

projects.title: Hackathon Ministerie Buitenlandse Zaken
projects.description:
A hackathon was organised by the dutch Department of Foreign Affairs to help Dutch people abroad find the information they need. We as van Stein en Groentjes build an application that allowed Dutch people abroad to communicate with each other through a live chat, and that showed all the important information. 

Functionality built in was:
- A chat feature with chatrooms per country
- Newsfeed for the country where the user is from CNN, NOS, Le Monde, Bild and of course the Dutch Department of Foreign Affairs.
- Info on what to do in case of emergency
- On click contact with the embassy or consulate.

profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
We believe in maximizing user experience and effectiveness by designing applications that make use of Artificial Intelligence concepts and technologies.  We are convinced that new technologies enable us to make life more comfortable and productive by saving time with everyday routine tasks. 

My job is to make sure that development of the Smartnotation mobile platform stays on track. Together with a team of developers we implement AI, voice recognition and other concepts to assist you in increasing your productivity.
profile_positions.title: VP Mobile Development

profile_positions.description: Gulliver is Leidens biggest student entrepreneurship contest. My responsibillities were to grow and attain a network of coaches for the participants and to build and maintain the website. The competition ended with a spectecular final in the Stadsgehoorzaal in Leiden where we were hosts to Prince Constantijn of Oranje Nassau and a large audience of interested people.
profile_positions.title: IT and Coaches

profile_positions.description:
With Habit99 we help you achieve your objectives. A healthier way of life, unlearning bad habits, being more positive or increasing your (social) skills. You can do it all!

Because friends join you and help you, you are more motivated. Achieving your goals becomes more effective, fun and enjoyable.
The habit99 app builds on behavioral research and uses social dynamics and gamification to keep you motivated.

With Habit99 we help people shape and sustain their own change. We do this by making it easy and fun. We actively mobilise your environment such that they help you change. Their help is key in achieving your goals.
Habit99 – Makes change easy and fun by doing it together

volunteer_experiences.description: The Gumball 3000, had a checkpoint in Amsterdam. I volunteerd as a traffic director to help make sure all cars knew how to get to the checkpoint.

I was part of a brainstorm group that formed the basic idea for a film. The idea was translated to a script and filmed, edited and produced in 48 hours. 

Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qV5jEWr24OE
